# bp

## Description


Set a breakpoint at the specified address.
## Usage


```bash
usage: bp [-h] where

```
## Positional Arguments

|Positional Argument|Help|
| :--- | :--- |
|where|The address to break at.|

## Optional Arguments

|Short|Long|Help|
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
|-h|--help|show this help message and exit|
